攦字的基本解释

攦
lì
折断：“攦工倕之指，而天下始人有其巧矣。”
扭转。
击。

攦
shài
打扫。
洒。
挥摆，甩动。

攦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《集韻》郎計切，去霽，來。］
(1)拗折。
(2)击。
(3)见“獦2攦”。
[②]［shài］
［《集韻》所賣切，去卦，來。］
(1)甩；挥摆。
(2)散发。参见“攦2秀”。

攦字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　攦； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页464第22
【集韻】【韻會】?郞計切，音麗。折也，撕也。【莊子·胠篋篇】攦工倕之指，而天下始人有其巧矣。　又【集韻】所綺切，音屣。義同。【莊子註】徐邈讀。　又輦尒切，音邐。義同。又【集韻】【韻會】?力結切。與捩音義同。又拗也。　又【集韻】郞敵切，音歷。【博雅】擊也。與擽同。　又所賣切，音曬。掃也。

攦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
攦字的起名意思

暂无。

Scratch
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lì］
["Ji Yun" Lang Ji cut, go to Ji, come. ]
(1) Folding.
(2) Hit.
(3) See "Feng 2 攦".
[②]［shài］
[Sold in "Ji Yun", go to Gua, come. ]
(1) Flick; swing.
(2) Distribute. See "Lian 2 Show".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　攦; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 464-22
[Jiyun] [Rhyme]? Yan Jiqie, Yinli. Fold it, tear it. [Zhuangzi·Pangpi Chapter] The first person in the world has his own ingenuity.　[Jiyun] The beautiful cut, the sound. The same meaning. [Zhuangzi's Note] Xu Miao's reading.　 Cut again and again, and the sound. The same meaning. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? The force is cut. It has the same meaning as the sound. It's awkward.　[Jiyun] Yan Diqie, sound calendar. [Bo Ya] Hit also. Same as Lun.　It is sold again, and the sound is dried. Scan also.
